name: @rocket.chat/e2e-crypto-core
description: Runtime-agnostic, sans-IO end-to-end encryption core for Rocket.Chat (Double Ratchet, key management, message formats)

scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json --module commonjs --outDir dist-cjs && node ./scripts/postbuild.cjs
